Rewards Rate: 4 RPs per ₹200 on UPI transactions above ₹2,000, 2 RPs per ₹200 on other online spends
Reward Redemption: Reward points earned can be redeemed against a host of choices at the Yes Rewardz portal

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on spends between Rs. 400 to Rs. 5000, with maximum benefit capped at Rs. 125 per statement cycle
